Change Log
==========

0.0.1 (06/27/2022)
------------------
- First Release (setup dodecahedron face as COM model).

0.0.2 (06/27/2022)
------------------
- Adding all Platonic solid model.

0.0.3 (06/28/2022)
------------------
- Moving Platonic function into seperate file.

0.0.4 (06/28/2022)
------------------
- Seperated files are not supported in pypi, return all functions into __init__.py file.
- Optimize functions.

0.0.5 (06/28/2022)
------------------
- Adding printed message when finished writing files.
